titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to define the term "State" for the purposes of the microloan program carried out under that Act, and for other purposes.
Northern Mariana Islands Entrepreneurship Act of 2021
Northern Mariana Islands Entrepreneurship Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Northern Mariana Islands Entrepreneurship Act of 2021
This bill expands eligibility for the Microloan Program of the Small Business Administration to include the Northern Mariana Islands.
